data.eml:eml: Taxonomic review of the deep water flathead genus Parabembras with description of the new species Parabembrasmultisquamata from the western Pacific Ocean (Teleostei, Parabembridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kai, Yoshiaki, Fricke, Ronald (2018): Taxonomic review of the deep water flathead genus Parabembras with description of the new species Parabembrasmultisquamata from the western Pacific Ocean (Teleostei, Parabembridae). ZooKeys 740: 59-76, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.740.21729, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.740.21729
